body:
## Changelog
- Handle the exceptions thrown at first indexing, when last_update is missing

## Changelog
- Fix error in river deletion after completion in multi-node setup

## Changelog

This release adds some breaking changes in sync logic
- Use `syncTimeProp` over the source graph of the resource instead of the resource itself
- Add `graphSyncConditions` option for sync in order to filter out irrelevant source graphs

See the [README](https://github.com/eea/eea.elasticsearch.river.rdf#synchronization-with-an-endpoint) for full documentation
over the new changes

## Changelog
- Fix language adding bug in sync routine
  - When resource property labels were harvested, the language of the label is now dropped.

## Changelog
- Allow DESCRIBE Queries
- Remove river mapping after completing Sync or Index
  - This way, re-indexing will not be triggered at every service restart
- Codebase Spring Cleanup

## CHANGES SINCE LAST VERSION
- Upgrade Sync performance
- Remove EEA specific code from Sync code
- Handle Sync failures so changed documents are re-indexed at the next Sync call
- Improve Sync logging
  - log deleted resources
  - log the exit status of the sync procedure
  - log the number of updated files
- Various other bug fixes

Changes Since Last Version:
- Make use of bulk requests. Thanks @hemed 
- Index correct literal types in SELECT queries

Changes since last version:

Add support for default missing values

name: Legacy Releases
body: This release includes an archive with all previous builds that were available using http://raw.github.com urls.
